quest.name: What Price Victory
journal: Hildibrand is contemplating the implications of Ultros's behavior.

Convinced that Ultros's suspicious behavior is simply the hapless advances of a lovesick octopus, Hildibrand chooses to pursue a different line of investigation: the gladiatrix Avila. Return to the Coliseum and inquire with Dour Meadow as to her current whereabouts.

Dour Meadow explains that Avila left the Coliseum a short while ago to share a flagon of ale with her countrymen, while warning you that the warrioress does not take kindly to others poking around in her personal affairs. Undeterred by these words, Hildibrand dashes off to continue his investigation. Follow him to the Coffer & Coffin in central Thanalan and see what knowledge might be gleaned.

At the Coffer & Coffin, a confident Avila assures her fellow Ala Mhigans that her victory in the upcoming tourney is all but certain. The conversation is not particularly enlightening, save for the information that Avila intends to pay a visit to her sister at the Nanawa Mines. Meanwhile, Ultros's plan to dispatch Hildibrand is foiled when the gentleman inspector, his nose well honed from his experiences with Nashu's homemade explosives, catches a whiff of the cleverly disguised bomb and hurls it off fortuitously in the direction of its maker. Your path free of danger, accompany Hildibrand to the mines and assist with his continued investigation.

Eavesdropping on the sisters' conversation reveals Avila's true motivation for entering the Mythril Cup─to claim the priceless relic and a better life for her and her sister─if not the source for her unfaltering confidence. With no remaining leads to pursue and the Mythril Cup set to commence, Ellie suggests a return to Ul'dah. In the meantime, Ultros's best-laid plans again go awry, as Hildibrand stumbles headfirst into a pitfall dug by the octopus in hopes of incapacitating you before the tourney can begin. Safe once more due to the uncanny instincts of the gentleman inspector, you are free to follow him off in the direction of the Gate of Nald.

Determined as ever to keep you from competing in the tourney, Ultros enlists the services of a chimera to forestall your return to Ul'dah. This plan proves to be as successful as his last two─which is to say, not very─when none other than Godbert, ever the Manderville man, arrives on the scene and makes short work of the beast. In a brief exchange, he mentions having come to Thanalan in search of inspiration for his latest work of goldsmithery, and offers a few words of encouragement to his son as his hour of truth in the Coliseum draws nigh. Meanwhile, Ultros finds an unlikely ally in the form of Gilgamesh, who has returned to avenge his defeat at the hands of you and your sleuthing companion. His fortune is short-lived, however, when he is spotted by Godbert, who sees in the colorful sea critter not just inspiration, but also potential materials for his masterworks. As the mustachioed muscle-head beats the unfortunate octopus into a bloody pulp, return to the Coliseum and rendezvous with the gentleman inspector.

His vaunted powers of deduction having failed to afford any knowledge that might avail him regarding the tourney at hand, Hildibrand is nevertheless not disheartened in the least, cheerily declaring that he will continue the investigation on the field of battle. This can only end well for all involved...
objectives: Speak with Dour Meadow on the Steps of Thal.
Speak with Hildibrand at the Coffer & Coffin.
Follow Hildibrand to the Gate of Nald.
Speak with Hildibrand in front of the Coliseum.

dialogue.name: HILDIBRAND
dialogue.text: Poor, misunderstood Ulty! Here we suspected him of criminal activity, when in truth he was just a gentle soul luckless in love! Oh, Ulty─can you find it in your squishy, slimy heart to forgive us!?

dialogue.name: ELLIE
dialogue.text: ...Yes, yes. Now, perhaps we should return to our investigation? If Avila is as suspicious as they say, perhaps we should follow her around for a bit. Dour Meadow back at the Coliseum should be able to enlighten us as to her whereabouts.

dialogue.name: HILDIBRAND
dialogue.text: An excellent idea, Miss Ellie, but I have a better one! Let us return to the Coliseum and speak with Dour Meadow. From him, we shall ascertain Miss Avila's whereabouts, upon which we shall follow her about to see if she is indeed as suspicious as they say! Come, Nashu, the investigation calls!

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: Don't think Uncle Ulty didn't see you following me!

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: What's the big idea, eh? I'm nothing more than a stupid octopus! Gwee-hee-hee...

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: ...Or am I?

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: Come on, now, I just want what any octopus wants─a cute girl, untold riches, and the admiration of millions. Can't Uncle Ulty dream?

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: Well, kids, hate to ink and run...then again, I am an octopus!

dialogue.name: NASHUMHAKARACCA
dialogue.text: Poor Mister Ultros didn't seem to have much luck with the ladies. Speaking only for myself, I'd love to have him for dinner! Perhaps in a nice lemon butter sauce...

dialogue.name: DOURMEADOW
dialogue.text: Yes? What is it this time? I'm a busy man.

dialogue.name: DOURMEADOW
dialogue.text: Looking for Avila, you say? She said something 'bout sharin' a flagon with her countrymen over at the Coffer & Coffin. I reckon you might still find her there.

dialogue.name: DOURMEADOW
dialogue.text: I'll warn ye, though: if you're smart, you'll keep yer distance from that one. That poor bugger Ganelon tried to interview her for an article─thought the girl was going to rip his head clean off.

dialogue.name: DOURMEADOW
dialogue.text: How can I put this? She doesn't seem to take kindly to bein' asked questions of a personal nature, if you catch my drift.

dialogue.name: DOURMEADOW
dialogue.text: That said, if you're lookin' for a good sparrin' match to warm ye up for the tourney, that might be just the ticket. Gar har har!

dialogue.name: HILDIBRAND
dialogue.text: (-Hildibrand-)I can assure you there will be no need for gratuitous fisticuffs, my good sir! With my remarkable powers of espionage, we will ascertain all the information we need without the fiery lass even being alerted to our presence. Let us be off!

dialogue.name: DOURMEADOW
dialogue.text: If you're lookin' for Avila, like as not you'll find her at the Coffer & Coffin, sharin' a drink with her countrymen.

dialogue.name: HILDIBRAND
dialogue.text: Behold! The lovely Miss Avila, just as predicted! Let us keep watch from here, so as not to set off the girl's famed temper.

dialogue.name: AVILA
dialogue.text: How many times must I tell you? There is no cause for concern. The spoils shall be mine─it may as well be writ in stone.

dialogue.name: AVILA
dialogue.text: Do you realize what this means? We have suffered, and suffered long. But my victory shall mark a new era! Just as Raubahn Aldynn won a new life for himself in the Coliseum, I shall win a new life for our people!

dialogue.name: AVILA
dialogue.text: The prize that I shall claim will bolster the wealth of our people a thousand─no, ten-thousandfold! In a land where wealth is power, we will be kicked to the gutter by the Ul'dahns no longer. And with that, I must be off to the Nanawa Mines to meet my sister.

dialogue.name: HILDIBRAND
dialogue.text: Miss Avila's self-assurance is ever a sight to behold! I deduce that my own chances of felling her on the field of battle are infinitesimal!

dialogue.name: ELLIE
dialogue.text: ...I could have told you that before you signed up. Come now, we have a suspect to pursue!

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: Gwee-hee-hee! Trying to steal Avila from Uncle Ulty's tentacles, are you? I'm afraid that isn't going to happen.

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: Yes, Uncle Ulty's homemade explosive will see that this is the end of the road for you. ...Does that make me a bad octopus?

dialogue.name: HILDIBRAND
dialogue.text: Ah, the distinctive smell of firesand! Another one of your handcrafted explosives, I take it, Nashu?

dialogue.name: NASHUMHAKARACCA
dialogue.text: Heavens no, Inspector! This is far too elaborate to be one of mine! Do you think whoever crafted this would be willing to give me a lesson?

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: Th-They're onto me? Preposterous! Could it be that muscle-head isn't as stupid as he looks!?

dialogue.name: HILDIBRAND
dialogue.text: ...I see. In any event, I shudder to think of what might happen if an unsuspecting passerby chanced upon such a hazardous object. Allow me. Heave...ho!

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: You gotta be kidding meeeeeeeeeeee!

dialogue.name: HILDIBRAND
dialogue.text: That maiden in mining garb must be the sister of whom Miss Avila spoke. Let us listen a bit closer.

dialogue.name: AVILA
dialogue.text: I thought we agreed: no hard labor until your leg is healed! I swear, sometimes I think you were born solely to give your poor sister headaches!

dialogue.name: HEGELINA
dialogue.text: ...Says the girl who once fought off ten imperials with one good arm. Perhaps someday you'll understand that your little sister can take care of herself just as well as you. Speaking of which, what news of the tourney?

dialogue.name: AVILA
dialogue.text: Worry not, Hegelina. I have taken all the necessary precautions. The Warden's Grace is as good as ours.

dialogue.name: AVILA
dialogue.text: Even the most modest estimates value its worth at some thirty million gil! Do you realize what this means? Necklaces from Eshtaime's! Sunsilk dresses! All the luxuries you've ever wanted will be yours!

dialogue.name: AVILA
dialogue.text: The poor little girls in shabby clothes, objects of pity and scorn for the Ul'dahn upper crust─those days are over! After I claim victory, we will take our rightful place at the top of society!

dialogue.name: HEGELINA
dialogue.text: I...I don't know, Avi. Wealth is all well and good, but...

dialogue.name: HEGELINA
dialogue.text: When I see you stand tall in the Coliseum, hundreds and thousands cheering your name, I...I am proud. No matter how humble our birth, if we stand strong, and stand together... This alone is all the wealth I ask for...

dialogue.name: AVILA
dialogue.text: ...That is your problem, Hegelina. You've always been too quick to settle for less than you're worth. But worry not, for your sister is watching over you. I will do this...for us. Now I must return─gods forbid one of those prying reporters overhears us.

dialogue.name: HEGELINA
dialogue.text: That's my Avi─unfazed by a duel to the death, yet terrified to be caught in a moment of tenderness. May the gods smile on you, Sister, and...be safe.

dialogue.name: HILDIBRAND
dialogue.text: <sniff> A more moving display of sisterly love I have not seen! And yet I fear it has afforded us little in the way of prospective clues.

dialogue.name: ELLIE
dialogue.text: It would seem Avila's obsession with victory runs even deeper than we imagined. That said, I can't help but feel a bond with the girl. My sister and I were alone in the world, too, you see...

dialogue.name: NASHUMHAKARACCA
dialogue.text: Inspector! Did you just hear what I heard!?

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: Look, kids, Uncle Ulty has had it up to here with you. D'ya think you could just fall in this pit and die like a good little girlboy?

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: Gwee-hee-hee... I'm talking to you, MissusMister Warrior of Light. Hear that sound? Just one step closer...closer...!

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: Not you, you idiot!!!

dialogue.name: HILDIBRAND
dialogue.text: ...Ahem! No need for concern, friends! I have simply taken the liberty of investigating this hole in the ground, and am pleased to report that there seems to be nothing out of the ordinary!

dialogue.name: ELLIE
dialogue.text: ...Our hero. Now, shall we return to Ul'dah? The Mythril Cup will be starting before long, and the last thing we want after all this is to lose our bout by forfeit.

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: Could it be!? Did that muscle-head dive straight into my trap to save his companions?

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: The others seem completely unsurprised at this turn of events. Doubtless he has performed such selfless acts before. A true gentleman if I ever saw one!

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: ...But if you think that means I'm gonna show mercy on you, you've got another think coming! Time to break out the big guns, kids!

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: ...Wait a minute. I dug two pits, didn't I? Come to think of it, the second one was right around...

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: Gimme a breeeaaaaaakkk...!

dialogue.name: ELLIE
dialogue.text: Whatever does he think he's found this time?

dialogue.name: ELLIE
dialogue.text: Yes? Is something the matter? We're on something of a tight schedule here, Inspector.

dialogue.name: HILDIBRAND
dialogue.text: Stand back, Miss Ellie! My well-honed inspector's senses are tingling. I feel a most fearsome adversary lurking about!

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: This time you're really up the creek without a paddle, kids. Mwa ha ha!

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: Say hello to a not-so-little friend of mine from the Coliseum. He's large, he's in charge, and most of all...he's hungry! Gwee-hee-hee!

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: Where in the world is he!? I haven't got all nightday!

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: M-My chimera! Who is that half-naked fool!?

dialogue.name: HILDIBRAND
dialogue.text: Father! Could it be that the aura of unmitigated murderous rage that I felt was not our quarry, but you!?

dialogue.name: GODBERT
dialogue.text: Hildy! I was merely taking a stroll in search of inspiration and materials for my newest masterpiece in the making. And what brings you and your friends to these parts today?

dialogue.name: HILDIBRAND
dialogue.text: Just a bit of sleuth work, Father dear. And with that, we must return to Ul'dah. If you have not heard, your son is set to compete for the Mythril Cup.

dialogue.name: GODBERT
dialogue.text: Oho! Moonlighting as a gladiator, are we? A fitting second career for a Manderville man, if I do say so myself!

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: That muscle-bound old man is the inspector's father!? Remind me never to go to one of their family reunions!

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: Gah! Just who is this inspector, anyway!?

dialogue.name: GILGAMESH
dialogue.text: (-???-)Hildy is...a worthy rival, if ever there were one.

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: Wh-Who goes there!?

dialogue.name: GILGAMESH
dialogue.text: Hildy...Forename. I have been waiting for this day.

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: Well, looky who we have here. You're quite the intimidating gent yourself. A friend of the inspector, mayhap?

dialogue.name: GILGAMESH
dialogue.text: I am Gilgamesh, wandering duelist. And I am not so much the inspector's friend as...his enemy.

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: Well, that makes two of us! Perk up, Gulliver, 'cause this just might be our lucky day.

dialogue.name: GILGAMESH
dialogue.text: Is there no one in this accursed realm who can remember my─ <sigh> Call me what you will, friend, but heed my words: Forename is a formidable foe.

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: That's soundin' like high praise comin' from a big fella like yerself. To have such a powerhouse as his sidekick, that inspector must be somethin' else indeed!

dialogue.name: GILGAMESH
dialogue.text: I know not what brings you to do battle with those two, but I warn you: you will end up as seafood soup if you face them alone.

dialogue.name: GILGAMESH
dialogue.text: And with that, I must be off. For reasons that I do not entirely understand, I am considered something of a fugitive in these parts.

dialogue.name: GILGAMESH
dialogue.text: Forename... I will not fall so easily this time.

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: Well, it looks like I've got my legs full─all eight of 'em. But if that adventurer's too strong to take on alone...

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: ...I'll just have to bring along a friend. Mwa ha ha!

dialogue.name: GODBERT
dialogue.text: A supplely twisting ring calling to mind the undulations of a creature of the sea! Yes, inspiration has struck!

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: Eh heh heh... Uh, nobody here but us octopodes?

dialogue.name: GODBERT
dialogue.text: Look forward to your next life as a masterpiece, fiend!

dialogue.name: ORTHRUS
dialogue.text: Muscle-heads─I haaaaaaaaate 'em!

dialogue.name: HILDIBRAND
dialogue.text: Good heavens! Chancing upon Father like that─I daresay it's taken a year off my life.

dialogue.name: HILDIBRAND
dialogue.text: Quite a crowd has assembled. It would seem the festivities are nigh about to commence!

dialogue.name: HILDIBRAND
dialogue.text: I had hoped to uncover more of Miss Avila's secrets, but no matter! What better place to continue my investigation than on the field of battle!?
